item.title: I need Server Help! paying 500k in Rs cash if you help me solve this!
item.dc:creator: @littlesoul littlesoul
item.description:
@littlesoul wrote:

first this first lern java read java for dummys then just go throw a client and read it and you will start to pick it up how its all riten first just start of with .cfg easy as pie… and then fix your complie.bat and move on to java to you need to complie to chang .java programs and then you can start adding stuf in new skills places objects so on make a no-ip or a hamachi network so you can let others play you server but get a good fire wall like zone lab because hamachi is p2p and you can get spy ware from the other poeple on your network i would say you should pick project 16.6 by wolf this server is good then go and get the slayer strick and add that and you would have all most every spell just the curse and stuf and the other slayer spell ctummble undead. then you would want a client as well most poepel use mopar but because of its old cahce files i recomend you make your own one or use endar i do a lil of both i use half endar and half of runescape i ant got time to find links 6:21 and im tiard and bord lol but god luck make a forum and site AND TRY TO MAKE BACK UPS OF YOUR SERVER BEFOR YOU CHANG STUF i make client.java back ups all the time and server back ups onces every 4 days to insure i dont lose any thing losing 270+ commands 57 packed shops and a fully working npc.cfg item.cfg and a half dun runescape shop.cfg would be a bit of a killer good luck
